name: HODL
description: HODL is a community-driven meme token that celebrates the spirit of holding through market volatility. Built on strong meme culture and transparent tokenomics, it rewards patience and loyalty over short-term gains. Embracing humor and resilience, HODL turns market dips into a symbol of strength. With no false promises or hype, it stands as a reminder that true value in crypto often lies in holding firm, not chasing trends. HODL is more than a token—it’s a mindset.
